name: Radiant Space Extensions
description: Official extension repository for Radiant Space webtoon reader

extensions.name: Demo Source
extensions.description: Demo extension with mock webtoon data for testing. Includes 12 popular webtoon titles with chapters and pages.

extensions.name: Manga Haven
extensions.description: Browse and read manga and webtoons from Manga Haven. Features a large library of ongoing and completed series.

extensions.name: Webtoon Galaxy
extensions.description: Access thousands of webtoons from Galaxy translators. Specializes in Korean manhwa and Chinese manhua.

extensions.name: Scans FR
extensions.description: French translated manga and webtoons. Largest French scanlation directory.
